name: Real Talk
description:
A typing game about the difficulty of small talk and the comforts of home.

As you venture into the outside world and interact with the people you find, your energy levels will drop, and talking will become harder and harder. Return home to recharge, relax, and get ready for the next round of social interaction.

Controls:

  • W/S/A/D : Move
  • All letter keys: conversations/object interactions

Credits:

Made in two days as part of Global Game Jam 2019, in Guildford Library, by:

  • Liam de Valmency (Design/Code/Art)
  • Lisa Devon (Music/Sfx)
